name: International Webinar on Plant Science and Molecular Biology
content: Magnus Group would like to extend an invitation to join our webinar entitled International Webinar on Plant Science and Molecular Biology “Plant Science Virtual 2020” on July 13- 14 2020 around the Theme: “To Exchange Innovations and Emerging Novel Research in Plant Sciences”. The purpose of the Plant Science Virtual 2020 is to fill the gap of knowledge sharing that has been laid down by the Covid-19\. Join us and exchange new ideas from scientists, delegates which helps to find global partners for future collaboration in the field of Plant Science. This Plant Science Virtual webinar consist of a lecture, presentation, workshop, and seminar.
